/* VendrMapper.getHqVendrList */
SELECT A.HQ_BRAND_CD, A.VENDR_CD, A.VENDR_NM, A.OWNER_NM, A.BIZ_NO, A.BIZ_TYPE_CD, A.BIZ_ITEM_CD, A.TEL_NO, A.FAX_NO, A.EMAIL_ADDR, A.POST_NO, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, A.SHIP_FG, A.VAT_INCLD_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REMARK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.VENDOR_FG
FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR A
AND A.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} --거래처코드
AND A.VENDR_NM LIKE '%'||#{vendrNm}||'%' --거래처명
AND A.VENDOR_FG = #{vendorFg} --거래처구분
